participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, she enjoys spending time with friends and is eager to explore life outside her parents' home.
participant_1.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i work took i've a part time job at burger king. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. they are constantly on my back. i do not drink or do drugs or anything.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Reflective and resilient, he has overcome significant challenges in life and appreciates the simple pleasures of each day.
participant_2.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i'm a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
Short bio: constantly on my back
